short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skips Prime intros & ads. It also includes a autoplay function to play the next episode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Skip Intro & Ads Including Autoplay to Play Next Episode for Prime
**It doesn't skip intro, ads or autoplay next episode for Amazon IMDB TV**

Your settings should be synchronized with your Google account.

You need to refresh the Prime page only once after installing. This extension doesn't collect any data from you.

This extension is Open-Source & on Github:
https://github.com/necm1/prime-plus

**IMPORTANT: This extension is not and has no connection to Prime.**
